| A dark Angel:* can [fly](/wiki/Fly "Fly").
* has [a head, a couple of arms, and a torso](/wiki/Humanoid "Humanoid").
* can [see invisible creatures](/wiki/See_invisible "See invisible").
* [does not eat](/wiki/Inediate "Inediate"). (\*)
* is not a valid [polymorphable](/wiki/Polymorph "Polymorph") form.
* is normally generated [hostile](/wiki/Hostile "Hostile").
* can [follow](/wiki/Follower "Follower") you to other levels.
* is [nasty](/wiki/M2_NASTY "M2 NASTY").
* is [strong](/wiki/Strong "Strong").
* can pick up weapons and food.
* has [infravision](/wiki/Infravision "Infravision").
* appears only in [Gehennom](/wiki/Gehennom "Gehennom").
* [never leaves a corpse](/wiki/Corpseless "Corpseless"). |                                                                                                                                                                                 |

A **dark Angel**, A, is a type of [monster](/wiki/Monster "Monster") that appears in [UnNetHack](/wiki/UnNetHack "UnNetHack"). It is a [chaotic](/wiki/Chaotic "Chaotic") [humanoid](/wiki/Humanoid "Humanoid") [angelic being](/wiki/Angelic_being "Angelic being") that is [strong](/wiki/Strong "Strong") and will pick up items, and is capable of [following](/wiki/Follow "Follow") [you](/wiki/You "You") to other levels.

A dark Angel has three weapon attacks and a [stunning](/wiki/Stunning "Stunning") [gaze](/wiki/Gaze "Gaze") attack, and possesses [cold resistance](/wiki/Cold_resistance "Cold resistance"), [shock resistance](/wiki/Shock_resistance "Shock resistance"), [sleep resistance](/wiki/Sleep_resistance "Sleep resistance"), and [poison resistance](/wiki/Poison_resistance "Poison resistance").

## Generation

Dark Angels are only randomly generated in [Gehennom](/wiki/Gehennom "Gehennom") and [Sheol](/wiki/Sheol "Sheol"), and are not a valid form for normal [polymorph](/wiki/Polymorph "Polymorph").

Dark Angels [do not leave corpses](/wiki/Corpseless "Corpseless") upon death.

## Encyclopedia entry

When we have understood about free will, we shall see how silly it is to ask, as somebody once asked me: 'Why did God make a creature of such rotten stuff that it went wrong?' The better stuff a creature is made of -- the cleverer and stronger and freer it is -- then the better it will be if it goes right, but also the worse it will be if it goes wrong. A cow cannot be very good or very bad; a dog can be both better and worse; a child better and worse still; an ordinary man, still more so; a man of genius, still more so; a superhuman spirit best -- or worst -- of all.

\[ Mere Christianity, by C. S. Lewis ]

- *This page is a **[stub](/wiki/Category:Stubs "Category:Stubs")**. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by [**expanding this page**.](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Dark_Angel\&action=edit)*

html:
Dark Angel

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
A dark Angel (No tile)
Attacks Weapon 1d6 physical, weapon 1d6 physical, gaze 1d4 stun, weapon 1d6 physical
A dark Angel (No tile)
Attacks

Weapon 1d6 physical, weapon 1d6 physical, gaze 1d4 stun, weapon 1d6 physical

Base level 14

Speed 10
Base AC -4
Base MR 55
Alignment -12 (chaotic)
Frequency (by normal means) 1 (Very rare)
Genocidable Unknown
Weight 1450
Nutritional value 400
Size medium
Resistances cold, shock, sleep, poison

A dark Angel:

  • can fly.
  • has a head, a couple of arms, and a torso.
  • can see invisible creatures.
  • does not eat. (*)
  • is not a valid polymorphable form.
  • is normally generated hostile.
  • can follow you to other levels.
  • is nasty.
  • is strong.
  • can pick up weapons and food.
  • has infravision.
  • appears only in Gehennom.
  • never leaves a corpse.

A dark Angel, A, is a type of monster that appears in UnNetHack. It is a chaotic humanoid angelic being that is strong and will pick up items, and is capable of following you to other levels.

A dark Angel has three weapon attacks and a stunning gaze attack, and possesses cold resistance, shock resistance, sleep resistance, and poison resistance.

Generation

Dark Angels are only randomly generated in Gehennom and Sheol, and are not a valid form for normal polymorph.

Dark Angels do not leave corpses upon death.

Encyclopedia entry

When we have understood about free will, we shall see how silly it is to ask, as somebody once asked me: 'Why did God make a creature of such rotten stuff that it went wrong?' The better stuff a creature is made of -- the cleverer and stronger and freer it is -- then the better it will be if it goes right, but also the worse it will be if it goes wrong. A cow cannot be very good or very bad; a dog can be both better and worse; a child better and worse still; an ordinary man, still more so; a man of genius, still more so; a superhuman spirit best -- or worst -- of all.

[ Mere Christianity, by C. S. Lewis ]

A '''dark Angel''', {{black|A}}, is a type of [[monster]] that appears in [[UnNetHack]]. It is a [[chaotic]] [[humanoid]] [[angelic being]] that is [[strong]] and will pick up items, and is capable of [[follow]]ing [[you]] to other levels.

A dark Angel has three weapon attacks and a [[stunning]] [[gaze]] attack, and possesses [[cold resistance]], [[shock resistance]], [[sleep resistance]], and [[poison resistance]].

==Generation==
Dark Angels are only randomly generated in [[Gehennom]] and [[Sheol]], and are not a valid form for normal [[polymorph]].

Dark Angels [[Corpseless|do not leave corpses]] upon death.

==Encyclopedia entry==
{{encyclopedia|When we have understood about free will, we shall see how silly it is to ask, as somebody once asked me: 'Why did God make a creature of such rotten stuff that it went wrong?' The better stuff a creature is made of -- the cleverer and stronger and freer it is -- then the better it will be if it goes right, but also the worse it will be if it goes wrong. A cow cannot be very good or very bad; a dog can be both better and worse; a child better and worse still; an ordinary man, still more so; a man of genius, still more so; a superhuman spirit best -- or worst -- of all.
		|[ Mere Christianity, by C. S. Lewis ]
